üí∞ Expense Tracker

Smarter money, simpler tracking.

üìå What is this app?

  • A secure expense and billing tracker for daily usage.
  • Add, view, and manage personal bills and expenses.

‚≠ê Key Features

  • ‚úì Per-user expense and bill tracking

  • ‚úì Real-time Firebase sync + Offline support

üîê Your data is safe

  • All entries are stored securely

üß± Built Using
